entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -5.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 12:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 19 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: E 21 km/h gust 37 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain and a few flurries this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain and a few flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
